cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.CR, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the construction of locally recoverable codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The use of binary constant weight codes suggests a connection to coding theory and combinatorics (cs.DS, cs.CC). The paper also discusses the algorithmic construction of codes, which could fall under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR). Finally, the paper presents an explicit construction of codes, which could be relevant to the field of signal processing and image analysis (cs.SI).
